summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas detailing account balances and transactions for the month of November 2018. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and account management instructions.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

keyFacts: The account balance as of November 1, 2018, was $26,795.55.
The ending balance as of November 30, 2018, remained at $26,795.55.
There were no deposits made during the statement period.
Service charges and fees totaled $93.00 for the month.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
